title: BYTE_TO_HEXinASCII (Function)
text:
FUNCTION BYTE_TO_HEXinASCII : WORD
Converts one byte of binary code into one word in HEX code representing its ASCII value
The higher bits in the input are represented by the higher byte in the output.
Use
HEXinASCII_TO_BYTE
function for the reverse conversion.

rows.Name: BYTE_TO_HEXinASCII
rows.Comment: ASCII value as WORD of the inputB
